price: Yaa ilmaan Aadam! Masjida hunda birattuu bareechifannaa (uffata) keessan qabadhaa. Nyaadhaa, dhugaa, daangaa hin dabrinaa, Inni daangaa dabritoota hin jaalatu.{1}
arabic: ۞ يَٰبَنِيٓ ءَادَمَ خُذُواْ زِينَتَكُمۡ عِندَ كُلِّ مَسۡجِدٖ وَكُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ وَلَا تُسۡرِفُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ
footnotes: {1} yeroo salaataa hunda uffata gayaa barbaachisaa uffadhaa jechuudha.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yābanī ādama khudhū zīnatakum ʿinda kulli masjidin wakulū wa-ish'rabū walā tus'rifū innahu lā yuḥibbu al-mus'rifīna
